_header: Jesu almighty and Mary maiden free
_description: A prayer for defence against enemies — one stanza rhyme royal

Bod939.First Lines:
Ihesu almyghty and mary maydyn freBy the mediacion off comt
                    eternall…
Bod939.Last Lines:
…But only to the my lord & protectorAȝenst alle myn
                    enmys to be my defendor amen
Bod939.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 92.
